name: 「Dark Reader」 Rtd.moe - Specific
description:
Used to make only some novels into a dark style reader layout
Other novels can be added by editing the style and targeting that novels specific address.
additional_info:
• Supported Novels:
  • In a Different World with a Smartphone
  • Shinka no Mi
  • Return of the Former Hero
  • Other World’s Monster Breeder
  • Kumo desu ga, Nani ka?
  • Divine Protection of Many Gods
  • OreMegane
  • Being Able to Edit Skills in Another World, I Gained OP Waifus
  • I Said Make My Abilities Average!
  • Slave Harem in the Labyrinth of the Other World
  • Changelog:
  • Version 1.1
  • Added Support for more Novels.
  • Version 1.0
  • First Release.
